name: Shiba Light
description: SHIBA LIGHT is aiming to be one of the biggest DEX on the Solana-Blockchain powered by SHIBA. It will have near instant transactions, almost non existing fees and an ecosystem backed by the deflationary $SHIBT Token. In the future a NFT marketplace will be added, were you can buy, sell or mint NFTÂ´s. We are dedicated to help growing the crypto space. That is why we are going to develop a Token-Launchpad, which helps small projects to raise capital through an IDO or presale. It can be hard to get noticed or build up your trustworthiness, because of numerous teams doing rugpulls or scams. Our Launchpad will function as a middleman, which gives buyers more security and prevent early scams. Aside from that, launching projects will get featured on our site, what allows them to grow faster and gain publicity more quickly.
